system.description: The Character gains a Pain Token whenever a Ranged Attack that originated from within Perception Bonus Metres of them inflicts Critical Damage upon, Stuns, kills, or causes the failing of a Fear/Pinning Test of a living creature. This is Cumulative with Pain Tokens gained from the Cruel Demise Vile Pleasure if both conditions are eligible.

prerequisites.text: Dark Eldar, Deadeye Shot, Perception 45, Power Through Pain

system.notes: Dark Eldar specific. Grants Pain Tokens from witnessing suffering caused by ranged attacks.
